text: “Dawuda yi a xili, a naxa, ‘N Marigina.’ Awa, Alaa Muxu Sugandixin findixi Dawuda bɔnsɔnna ra di?”20.44 Na waxatini karamɔxɔne yi a falama a Alaa Muxu Sugandixin barima Dawuda bɔnsɔnna nin fata Alaa falan na Samuyɛli Firinden 7.16 kui. Anu, xa Dawuda nan Yaburin 110 sɛbɛ, nayi a tan a falama Alaa Muxu Sugandixin ma fa fala “N Marigina.” Na bunna nɛɛn fa fala Alaa Muxu Sugandixin gbo a benba Dawuda xa. Na yi muxune yifu, a yi a yita a Yesu Alaa Muxu Sugandixin tiden gbo dangu Dawuda ra Ala yɛɛ ra yi.
